meanings.sent1: She dances gracefully at the party.
meanings.sent2: The children love to dance at weddings.
meanings.sent3: The cat dances around the room chasing a toy.
meanings.sent4: The leaves on the trees dance in the wind.
meanings.sent5: His heart dances with joy when he hears music.

meanings.definition: Participates in social gatherings where dancing occurs
meanings.sent1: He enjoys attending dances with his friends.
meanings.sent2: The school organized a dance for the students.
meanings.sent3: The dance was filled with laughter and fun.
meanings.sent4: The dance brought the community together.
meanings.sent5: The dance floor was crowded with people enjoying themselves.

meanings.definition: Performs a series of movements to music
meanings.sent1: The ballet dancer dances beautifully on stage.
meanings.sent2: They practice every day to dance perfectly in the show.
meanings.sent3: The robot dances in a mechanical and precise manner.
meanings.sent4: The flames dance in the fireplace on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The waves dance along the shore in a rhythmic pattern.

meanings.definition: Moves in a quick and lively way
meanings.sent1: She dances swiftly across the stage.
meanings.sent2: The flames danced wildly in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel dances nimbly from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: The colors on the canvas dance vibrantly.
meanings.sent5: The words on the page dance energetically in his mind.
